findings.title: approve
findings.description: The approve function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function allows a non-whitelisted wallet to transfer a specified number of tokens.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: allow a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account

findings.title: Unprotected Permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is declared as external and lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The swapTokens function has a potential vulnerability due to lack of access control.

findings.title: Skim Finding
findings.description: The skim function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected Sync Function
findings.description: The 'sync' function is not protected by a reentrancy lock, allowing an attacker to drain the contract's funds.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function does not have any access modifiers and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized state changes.
